1100010111000110 1000100111111000 1 -> sum: 0100111110111111, cout: 1

0001111001110000 1001001010101001 0 -> sum: 1011000100011001, cout: 0

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
